unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability: Making Free Throws
question_text:
A professional basketball player has a $60$% chance of making his first throw. If he makes his first free throw, there is a $70$% chance he makes his second free throw. If he does not make his first throw, there is a $45$% chance he makes his second free throw.
If this professional basketball player has made his second free throw, what is the probability he missed his first throw?
